# Templates

## Catalogo
- Documento mestre: `factory-workflow/docs/templates/docs.template.md`
- Stack: `factory-workflow/docs/templates/stack.template.md`
- Design system: `factory-workflow/docs/templates/design-system.template.md`
- MCP: `factory-workflow/docs/templates/mcp.template.md`
- Prompt de distribuicao: `factory-workflow/docs/templates/distribution-prompt.template.md`
- Prompt de build: `factory-workflow/docs/templates/build-prompt.template.md`

## Como usar
1) Copie o template.
2) Preencha todos os campos obrigatorios.
3) Nao remova secoes obrigatorias.

## Placeholders padrao
- <NOME_PROJETO>
- <RESPONSAVEL>
- <DATA>
- <STACK>
- <LINKS>
